title: guneytasyurek
author: guneytasyurek
content: Guys What do you think about the portfolio I believe it will make at least 100X in the bull run. They aren't shitcoins or tokens instead; they are doing fantastic work to bring the masses to the blockchain.1. Unibright (Enterprise adoption)2. Mover (Card and saving)3.PhantasmaChain (Layer one gaming platform)4. Unfederal Reserve (Borrow and lending)5. Matrix (Artificial intelligence)

comments.author: NNRR
comments.body: The projects you are talking about here don't seem like very good projects to me, but since Crypto market can give any project in this market with a lot of profit at any time, I think Movr is a bit better among your projects. Good luck if you invest in any project here.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: From the projects that you mentioned I only heard of Phantasma. And that’s because I’m quite into the gaming NFT styles of projects and I didn’t see this one in a YouTuber that I am following. Most of the other projects I haven’t heard of.What projects do you feel strongly about OP?

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM Guys What do you think about the portfolio I believe it will make at least 100X in the bull run. They aren't shitcoins or tokens instead; they are doing fantastic work to bring the masses to the blockchain.1. Unibright (Enterprise adoption)Unibright just like an abandoned project. This token never got listed in a big exchange site. Unibright is nothing without the hype. It got increase a lot due to the bitcoin pump to reach new ATH. UBT has very poor development. The future is bad. Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM2. Mover (Card and saving)Are you sure about this? So many exchange sites have been even launching their own card. mover was a useless project. People would prefer to use debit card issued by binance and cryptodotcom rather than mover. This is bad. Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM3.PhantasmaChain (Layer one gaming platform)Phantasma doesn't look good enough. Any scalable blockchain can be used for gaming purpose. Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM4. Unfederal Reserve (Borrow and lending)Never heard this one exist before, did you mean rsr? Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM5. Matrix (Artificial intelligence)I will never invest in AI project, i have seen so many AI projects gone dead. There's no reason to invest in AI related projectI think that you shall focus into the protocol, gaming and defi. These are most potential fields for the future.

comments.author: _morghulis
comments.body: Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM Guys What do you think about the portfolio I believe it will make at least 100X in the bull run. They aren't shitcoins or tokens instead; they are doing fantastic work to bring the masses to the blockchain.1. Unibright (Enterprise adoption)2. Mover (Card and saving)3.PhantasmaChain (Layer one gaming platform)4. Unfederal Reserve (Borrow and lending)5. Matrix (Artificial intelligence)Haven't heard of any of them before. You might want to do more digging on them before raising your hope up. I believe that most of the devs behind those project you have abandoned them so for you to think that they'll ever give you a 100X profit is just so laughable.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Bytem3 on November 06, 2022, 07:47:10 PMI think meme coins like Tamadoge have potential similar to Shiba Inu if the community is strong enough. But I prefer playing it safe and staying with Bitcoin & Ethereum in the long-term.Do you think the meme coin hype will be a thing in the next bull run? If you still think so, then you haven't been paying attention to the mechanics of the crypto market.What is tamadoge even supposed to mean?A copycat shitcoin that can not help it by ride on Doge's popularity by adding "doge" to it's name... Reminds me of shitcoins like Bitcoin White, Bitcoin Red etc

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.created_time: November 06, 2022, 11:12:23 PMLast edit: November 07, 2022, 12:19:44 AM by Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM1. unibright (enterprise adoption)Definitely not. The project gave its x's a long time ago, you're too late to invest.Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM2. mover (card and saving)50\50 as almost all supply of this coin is circulating in the market, but there is a chance for growth after adding to the centralized exchanges.Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM3.PhantasmaChain (Layer one gaming platform)Definitely not. The project already gave its x's a long time ago, you are too late with the investment.Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM4. unfederal reserve (Borrow and lending)Scam. This project has been dead for a long time, you should not expect any super profits from it.Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM5. Matrix (Artificial intelligence)This project has been dead for a long time, you should not expect any super profits from it.

You said unfederal reserve is a scam; Cofounder keeps giving us an update, it might be a scam in the future but not now. You guys are horrific, making accusations of projects as scams without even searching.

comments.author: StormHawk
comments.body: Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM Guys What do you think about the portfolio I believe it will make at least 100X in the bull run. They aren't shitcoins or tokens instead; they are doing fantastic work to bring the masses to the blockchain.1. Unibright (Enterprise adoption)2. Mina Protocol2. Phala Network3. Aleph Zero4. Lukso5. Illuvium or GalaThe choice is yours but I propose you do research on these projects and compare with what you have

comments.author: Xal0lex

You said unfederal reserve is a scam; Cofounder keeps giving us an update, it might be a scam in the future but not now. You ask for the opinion of users, and when they express their opinion, you attack them because their opinion does not coincide with yours. You asked for the opinion of users, not an analysis of the projects you provided.P.S. After comments like that, I don't feel like answering you.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: Making a shill post about which projects you like is not really the way to get any attraction to it. They might be amazing projects, they might be terrible, I do not know because I never heard of any of them and I am not going to say anything good or bad about them. But when you make a topic like this, as you can see from the responses you get, it is not really a helpful thing but most likely it is a thing that will hurt the project.As you can see people are reacting badly, and if anyone sees the responses then they will not invest into it. So that means, not starting this topic would have helped even more because there wouldn't be bad reactions at least.

comments.author: CryptoGemsHunter
comments.body: Hey guys,I had been doing some research on altcoins to invest before they go public in DEX/CEX. Found this "The Conglomerate Capital" (https://www.congcap.com/), and it seems very interesting to me...experienced team, deep technical stuff...was wondering if any of you guys have taken a look too? In their twitter says the presaleve event to start soon, it that a good shoot ?

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Quote from: guneytasyurek on November 06, 2022, 10:34:51 AM What do you think about the portfolio I believe it will make at least 100X in the bull run. They aren't shitcoins or tokens instead; they are doing fantastic work to bring the masses to the blockchain.Good development is really a must but to expect them to make a 100X in the bull run seems not an appropriate mindset you should have. These projects might give you a good return but you should at least lower your expectations as unfortunately, even with how good the project is, there are other factors to consider for them to achieve that 100x increase.The fact that you were able to end up with that list with your own DYOR, I think you already know how to do some good projects based on your own view, at least. You won't put some trust in these projects in the first place if you didn't see something special about them but always remember that don't allow yourself to be looped in hype or shillers, if there's any.Good luck is the best advice I can say.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Not shitcoins? then you expect 100x in the future to me that's bullshit and not sure about the project you mentioned that even though bringing blockchain for the future still I don't trust altcoins that I don't think I'm familiar with.There are so many projects coming with different concepts even though they say it's not shitcoin or future coin still for me I won't invest in it except bitcoin one of my future assets I think you shouldn't be swayed by them saying it will be 100x all shitcoin same as but in reality they didn't survive and the project died.
